sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Button, Modal, Form } from "react-bootstrap";
import {  addcard } from 'react-redux'
import { } from '../../redux/listsSlice'
const InputModal = (props) => {
    set[company,setCompany] = useState("");
    set[jobTitle,setJobTitle] = useState("");

    return (
        <Modal
          {...props}
          size="sm"
          aria-labelledby="contained-modal-title-vcenter"
          centered
        >
          <Modal.Header closeButton>
            <Modal.Title id="contained-modal-title-vcenter">
              Modal heading
            </Modal.Title>
          </Modal.Header>
          <Modal.Body>
            <Form>
              <Form.Label>Company</Form.Label>
              <Form.Control type="text" placeholder="Company" value={company} autoFocus />
              <Form.Label>Job Title</Form.Label>
              <Form.Control type="email" placeholder="Job Title" value={jobTitle} />
            </Form>
          </Modal.Body>
          <Modal.Footer>
            <Button onClick={props.onHide}>Discard</Button>
            <Button onClick={props.onHide}>Save</Button>
          </Modal.Footer>
        </Modal>
      );
}

export default InputModal
